articles.summary: Matt Hougan believes institutional Bitcoin adoption, stablecoins, and tokenization could replace memecoins as the dominant narrative.       in the future, they will be replaced by other currencies. He believes they will replace memecosins.

articles.title: Bitcoin scam alert
articles.summary: Scammers are using Bitcoin ATMs as a way to access people's money, according to Attorney General Dave's release. Scammers will target consumers with urgent messages, such as 'protect your money' and 'take care of any criminal charges' during the scam.
